statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); ctx_size=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size'); current=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$current" != "null" ]; then ctx_tokens=$(echo "$current" | jq '(.input_tokens // 0) + (.cache_creation_input_tokens // 0) + (.cache_read_input_tokens // 0)'); else ctx_tokens=0; fi; branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); time=$(date '+%H:%M:%S'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); pct=$((ctx_tokens * 100 / ctx_size)); filled=$((pct * 20 / 100)); [ $filled -gt 20 ] && filled=20; bar=''; i=0; while [ $i -lt 20 ]; do if [ $i -lt $filled ]; then bar="${bar}█"; else bar="${bar}░"; fi; i=$((i+1)); done; if [ $pct -ge 90 ]; then bc='\033[31m'; elif [ $pct -ge 70 ]; then bc='\033[33m'; else bc='\033[32m'; fi; printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$model" "$dir"; [ -n "$branch" ] && printf " \033[33m%s\033[0m" "$branch"; printf " \033[90m%s\033[0m %s ${bc}%s\033[0m \033[2m%d%%\033[0m" "$time" "$style" "$bar" "$pct"
